comments.body: Learn how it works before investing other wise you do not know why it is going to rise and cannot have the belief required to invest. comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: OP, first of all you should be aware that every investment is a risk, not just bitcoin.Before you invest anything in bitcoin, I advise you to first get well informed and analyze the crypto market in detail.You need to understand that this is a long-term investment and not a way to get rich overnight.In accordance with your financial capabilities, you should make a concrete investment plan and have a clear exit strategy.I also advise you to diversify your investments and invest in different asset classes.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Forget all complexity and see Bitcoin as the currency you are familiar with with more advantage than any government issued currency. See it also has a currency that has removed the middle man centralized factor that is common amongst the financial institution which makes a Bitcoin holder responsible for their coin through a cryptographic method.It is basically a peer-to-peer electronic payment gateway that makes anyone in possession of the private key locking the coin to spend it only once.You can learn more on learn me a Bitcoin To buy your self some Bitcoin you can either use the decentralized exchange or the centralized exchange but if the centralized exchange is your convenient way to buy do well to move your coin to your cold wallet once you are done purchasing.Trevor or ledger wallet is amongst the best preferred decentralized wallets you can chose from

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP is from Nigeria. A lot of people come here from there, and of course, their interest in Bitcoin is understandable. Problems with the local currency force people to look for better payment methods, and I am glad that in this country you can pay with Bitcoin, as I understand it, quite calmly.But OP, why are you creating a topic here in the newbie's section? It would be better to get comfortable in your local section first; you have a very good support group. Understand that by asking general questions on one topic, people simply will not be able to provide you with the entire amount of information.Just look at the name of the forum—the entire forum is dedicated to discussing Bitcoin.Grow and learn; everything is in your hands.

comments.body: You are welcome to the forum, mate, but first you must understand many things about investing and think wisely before you begin investing, and before investing you must learn more and more about bitcoin, because everything in life has two sides, which are positive and negative, the positive side of bitcoin is very good and it changes people's lifestyles from zero to hero, but the negative side is when the price drops and you can't sell it at the particular time or you can't sell it at the particular time or you sell it without no gain or lose, so I advise before you invest learn much about bitcoin and ask for anything you don't understand,although no one is perfect, but I'm sure we have many people who are very smart and understand bitcoin here and can direct you through the process, feel free to ask questions mate.
